body.name: GREENER CHEF 30 Inch 3XL Extra Large Cutting Board with Lifetime Replacements - Oversized Bamboo Stove Top Cover Noodle Board - Wooden Meat Cutting Board - Turkey Carving Board - Charcuterie Board
features: SUPER IMPORTANT: Make sure you understand how massive this wood cutting board is before ordering. Get your measuring tapes out. 30 x 20 Inches.

THE KING OF CHRISTMAS HOLIDAY MEAL PREP – Lightweight Yet Massive - Love prepping an abundance of wholesome, mouthwatering food for the whole…neighborhood? Weighing in at a meager 11 lbs, this 30 inch cutting board with handle grooves boasts more than enough room to conquer Christmas Holiday and Thanksgiving turkeys and hams, tackle the biggest brisket BBQ, chop those monster watermelons and work as a bread bench without breaking your back.

EXTRA COUNTER TOP SPACE YOU NEED - A noodle board that fits perfectly over most electric stovetops, gas ranges and sinks to create that coveted extra countertop space during those holiday events, birthday parties and Thanksgiving feasts. 4oz corner spout & deep juice groove makes retaining spills, pouring off and transporting the juiciest chopping block meats a breeze.

MOM AND DAD APPROVED – Safest & Healthiest: We meticulously have every wooden cutting board 3rd party inspected under the strictest USA standards. A vigorous cutting board for restaurant environments and the healthiest choice for the people you love most.

LIFETIME REPLACMENTS - Unlike glass cutting boards or plastic cutting boards, we responsibly & ethically source our bamboo to last. In fact, we back this product for a lifetime! This Bamboo Cutting Board is a memorable housewarming gift or wedding gift and is well received by friends and family at Christmas, Mother’s Day, or even birthdays. For long-lasting beauty and durability, hand wash and oil it frequently with our 100% Pure Walnut Cutting Board Oil.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 100% Moso Bamboo Cutting Board, Good for your Family & the Environment This food-safe cutting board for kitchen measures 30 x 20 and still cleans up easily. Use the raw, natural bamboo chopping board to carve or chop your meats, fruit, veggies, or cheese. Prep a week’s worth of food on one carving board! Even capture extra juices to make glazes & gravies.

An Impressive Charcuterie Board from All-Natural Bamboo Don’t risk warping, dulling, or chipping your knives on plastic, glass, acacia, teak, or metal cutting boards. This bamboo cutting board is soft to preserve knives’ razor-sharp edges, but durable to withstand ultra-sharp knives. These chopping boards are designed with you and the Earth in mind.

Keep Your Family Safe When You Prep With This Healthy XXXL Cutting Board Prevent cross-contamination and clean your kitchenware effectively with a naturally water-resistant cutting board like this one. Rest easy knowing your family is protected with 100% Moso bamboo that’s natural, responsibly grown, and ethically harvested. They’re chemical-free, organic, and tough.

Inspired By Kitchen Gadgets That Are Both Functional & Beautiful This extra-large chopping block will be your favorite serving tray! The two-tone wood surface makes even the simplest occasions feel special. Even better, this natural bamboo chopping board fits over the sink in most cases, maximizing your workspace and making more room on your kitchen countertops.

The Only Extra Large Wood Cutting Board You’ll Ever Need This premium Moso bamboo noodle board offers a healthy way to meal prep. It even fits over your stove top or gas range to create more counter space. Owning a Greener Chef Bamboo Cutting Board is a solid testament to your conscious living, your family’s heath, and your awareness of the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Also looks great.
reviews.reviewText: This cutting board is easy to clean, looks great, is thin & lite enough to store almost anywhere. I have used it several times and you can hardly tell by looking at the surface. Its well made and should last for decades if taken care of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and In Charge Cutting Board
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Spacious Work Surface:The extra-large size of this bamboo cutting board provides an expansive and versatile workspace, accommodating large chopping tasks with ease.Eco-Friendly Material:Crafted from bamboo, a rapidly renewable resource, the cutting board aligns with eco-conscious values, making it an environmentally friendly choice for the kitchen.Durability Beyond Expectations:The natural hardness and density of bamboo contribute to the cutting board's exceptional durability. It withstands sharp knives and heavy-duty chopping, ensuring a long lifespan in the kitchen.Knife-Friendly Surface:The cutting surface strikes a balance between toughness and knife-friendliness, maintaining the sharpness of knives while providing a stable platform for various cutting tasks.Convenient Juice Grooves:The inclusion of juice grooves effectively captures excess liquids, preventing countertop messes and facilitating easy cleanup, especially when working with juicy fruits or meats.Easy Maintenance:Cleaning is a breeze with this cutting board. Its smooth surface allows for quick wiping, and occasional oiling helps maintain its condition, ensuring it remains ready for action with minimal effort.Aesthetically Pleasing Design:The warm tones and organic grain patterns of bamboo add a touch of natural elegance to the kitchen, making the cutting board not just a functional tool but also a visually appealing kitchen accessory.Cons:Requires Regular Maintenance:While the maintenance is relatively straightforward, the cutting board does require periodic oiling to preserve its quality. For those looking for a completely low-maintenance option, this may be a minor inconvenience.Can Be Heavy for Some Users:The substantial size and weight of the extra-large cutting board may pose a challenge for individuals who prefer lighter kitchen accessories or have limited storage space.May Develop Knife Marks Over Time:Like any cutting surface, the bamboo board is susceptible to knife marks with prolonged use. While this doesn't affect functionality, those who prefer a pristine appearance might find it less visually appealing over time.Conclusion:The Greener Chef Extra Large Bamboo Cutting Board impresses with its spacious design, eco-friendly composition, and durability. While maintenance and weight could be considerations for some users, the overall quality and functionality make it a worthy addition to any kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This board is sturdy, well made, and large enough for carving. Frankly, it's attractive too. I bought it to put below an electric skillet to protect the countertop, but i won't hesitate to use it for other things too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large cutting board
reviews.reviewText: Hard to find a large cutting board. This one looks good, is sturdy and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Heavier than expected, big enough and strong, I am still using it after buying it a year ago. The only complaint is it's not that easy to dry up and that part of the wood turns dark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m so glad I bought this! It really worked! It’s big and catches all the juice and the turkey didn’t move while cutting it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been wanting a new cutting board for a while now and have been putting off purchasing one because they can be so expensive for a good one. Got a great Black Friday deal on this cutting board which prompted me to buy it. I’m so glad I did. It is very well made, beautiful, and heavy. I’ve already used it and it washes up so easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for carving meat
reviews.reviewText: Deep grooves and plenty of carving space. Perfect addition as we get rid of all plastic in our house and transition to bamboo.Has a nice weight to it, and easily stores with the rest of our cutting boards.Also makes a perfect housewarming gift!
Keeps what is being carved steady

After learning that some bamboo cutting boards are not toxin free l found this one that is! I would have given it one more star if the price was a little lower but prices will probably reduce as more buyers realize that toxic cookware is unacceptable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: A light and good quality chopping board for BBQ! We only used twice but it seems to have good durability!

reviews.reviewTitle: Elegante, de calidad, y muy grande

reviews.reviewText: Fantastico, si pulisce facilmente si asciuga rapidamente, grande ci si può anche impastare pizza, ecc. Non si riga.
